documentation.text:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
@dev send 1000 Token with a minimum time lock of 1 hour
@dev send 2000 Token with a minimum time lock of 2 hours
@dev send 5000 Token with a minimum time lock of 5 hours
@dev turn faucet on
@dev turn faucet off

@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
@dev send 1000 Token with a minimum time lock of 1 hour
@dev send 2000 Token with a minimum time lock of 2 hours
@dev send 5000 Token with a minimum time lock of 5 hours
@dev turn faucet on
@dev turn faucet off

params._faucetName: sets the name for the faucet

drip1Token().details: send 1000 Token with a minimum time lock of 1 hour

drip2Token().details: send 2000 Token with a minimum time lock of 2 hours

drip5Token().details: send 5000 Token with a minimum time lock of 5 hours

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
